channel.title: Lol! scammed the scammer!
channel.description:
So, today i met this lvl 119, asked me "Hey can you help me with my pk vid"
Said only take my whip follow her to wild, and at lvl 30 wild, dds speced me (as was planned) and said eat this food
Gave me a shark, ate it, and then dropped 4 torag hammers noted told me to pickem up, and i knew at that moment that i was going to loose my whip (knew at the beginning already, took teletabs) so i picked them up and quickly logged, relogged on diff world, went to lvl 20 wild, teled out, free 400k.
Gf scammer.
2nd one
Noobs just dont learn eh?
takes me to the SAME place, same tactic, except d b axes (more cash for me hehehe) did the same thing, pmed him "Gf Scammer" And he logged lol
Gf Scammer.
3rd time!
Lvl 60 or something..
Says he wants someone for his pking vid intro (they all say pking vid lol noobs) and says he wants to show him killing a high level He lowers my hp Says "Heres your prize" Drops 4 verac flails, i pick it up, log into different world, forgot to turn private off, and he follows me, i escaped though (we used the lever in edge, used it again, ended up in ardy, teletabbed to varrock) Pmed him "Gf Scammer" Then he logged, then i sold the stuff for 492k
Gf Scammer.

this whole thread makes me want to head over to scam central…lumbridge.

item.title: Lol! scammed the scammer!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“recker450, post:15, topic:381570”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=477382.msg3493313#msg3493313 date=1297097064]
I make so much money off the “money dupers”
Here’s what u do

1.Find a guy saying “Doubling money”!!
2.Tell him you don’t trust him with 5m, so you’ll give him 25k-50k first
3.They give u cash back
4.???
5.PROFIT!!
6.Repeat for infinite money
[/quote][/quote]

Some of the auto typers don’t hear the whole “5m” part and teleport away with 25-50k, then walk back and you see them face to face, then they teleport away again.

Read full topic

item.title: Lol! scammed the scammer!
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

I remember back in 06-07 when i was lured. I knew it was a lure and when we got to the varrock pub, she said she had to go walk the dog (what a noob). As 10k looks like 1m+ she dropped 10k in wildy and logged…

I ran in saw like 5 people, got the cash and ran out (splashes).
Amazingly enough, she then logs back in and was like, that was a fast walk with your dog.

She dropped berserker helms this time, I ran in again again except I got iced, so I just teled.

Read full topic

item.title: Lol! scammed the scammer!
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

Almost happened to me to today, just about the same thing except she said “bring your bgs hilt and well dupe it”
I knew this was an obvious scam so I went along with it. She had me skulled and said “let me kill you now with protect item on”
“When I drop this item you pick it up quick” It was a Godsword blade (ALWAYS keeps over hilts) So i was like “Um ok then…”
So I picked it up and tele’d. Free 500k

Read full topic
